name: Rogue Space Force
description:
A game where you wont know whether winning is good or just losing! Be what it may, you'll lose points either way! Part of Wowie Game Jam 3.0

"SpaceShip has gone rogue, its going against its own kind, whether you follow its path or put restrain and not kill is your call...."

**Instructions**

  • Use UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT to control the ship
  • Your fire controls are hijacked, hold SPACE to restrain fire and not kill others
  • If you choose killing outcome may change when you die
  • If you die crashing 3 times without killing others outcome will be different.!

**Outcomes**

  1. You either die a hero!
  2. Or live long enough to see yourself become the villian!

If you crash into 3 ships that's minimal killing, you are hero..

If you went all out and later on got destroyed, you become a rogue..

Thanks a lot for coming by, your feedback and reviews are very helpful for improvements.... I will be uploading a devlog soon so stay tuned and check the youtube as well if you want! :)

Music Creds - youtube audio library Nico Staf.
